description.value:
Activate A Strike

This flask filled with corrosive acid deals 1 acid damage, 2d6 persistent acid damage, and 2 acid splash damage. You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls.

The liquid reagents in this vial rapidly absorb heat when exposed to air. A frost vial deals the listed cold damage and cold splash damage. On a hit, the target takes a status penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn. Many types of frost vial also grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls, the bomb deals 2d6 cold damage and 2 cold splash damage, and the target takes a -10-foot penalty.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.Effect: Frost Vial (Moderate)]{Effect: Frost Vial (Moderate)}
This mobile collection of vials and chemicals can be used for simple alchemical tasks.

This jangling, silvery bracelet makes you lighter on your feet, giving you a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics checks.

Activate A command

Frequency once per day

Effect You gain a +10-foot status bonus to Speed for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.Effect: Bracelet of Dashing]{Effect: Bracelet of Dashing}

A formula book holds the formulas necessary to make items other than the common equipment from this chapter; alchemists typically get one for free. Each formula book can hold the formulas for up to 100 different items. Formulas can also appear on parchment sheets, tablets, and almost any other medium; there's no need for you to copy them into a specific book as long as you can keep them on hand to reference them.

Activate A Interact

An antidote protects you against toxins. Upon drinking an antidote, you gain a +2 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against poisons for 6 hours.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.Effect: Antidote (Lesser)]{Effect: Antidote (Lesser)}

Activate A Interact

With a sharp twist of this item, you instantly create a screen of thick, opaque smoke in a burst centered on one corner of your space. All creatures within that area are concealed, and all other creatures are concealed to them. The smoke lasts for 1 minute or until dispersed by a strong wind.

The radius of the burst is 5 feet.

Pesgahi carries the following infused items, which last for 24 hours or until the next time he makes his daily preparations: @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Antidote (Lesser)]{Antidote (Lesser)} (2), @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Smokestick (Lesser)]{Smokestick (Lesser)} (2), @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Acid Flask (Moderate)]{Acid Flask (Moderate)} (6), @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Frost Vial (Moderate)]{Frost Vial (Moderate)} (4)

Requirements Pesgahi is adjacent to the corpse of a creature that died within the last hour.

Effect Pesgahi devours a chunk of the corpse and regains [[/r {2d6}[healing]]]{2d6 Hit Points}.

He can regain Hit Points from any given corpse only once.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19]

Stage 1 carrier with no ill effect (1 day)

Stage 2 [[/r {2d6}[negative]]]{2d6 negative damage} and regains half as many Hit Points from all healing (1 day)

Stage 3 as stage 2 (1 day)

Stage 4 [[/r {2d6}[negative]]]{2d6 negative damage} and gains no benefit from healing (1 day)

Stage 5 as stage 4 (1 day)

Stage 6 dead, and rises as a @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Ghoul]{Ghoul} the next midnight.

Any living, non-elf creature hit by Pesgahi's attack must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19] save or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Paralyzed]{Paralyzed}. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save.
Pesgahi can use Interact to draw a bomb and then Strike with it.
Pesgahi jumps up to half his Speed. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.
